hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: api
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the url for the api calls

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
IFS='Ï†' #consents insert echo "Creating Consents" while read datasetRef consentCode description participantCount variableCount sampleCount authz; do echo datasetRef $datasetRef echo description $description
if [ -f $participantCount ]; then echo participantCount empty, yeet participantCount=-1 fi
if [ -f $variableCount ]; then echo variableCount empty, yeet variableCount=-1 fi if [ -f $sampleCount ]; then echo sampleCount empty, yeet sampleCount=-1 fi
if [[ ${datasetRef} != 'datasetRef' ]]; then curl --show-error --silent --request PUT --data-urlencode "datasetRef=${datasetRef}" --data-urlencode "consentCode=${consentCode}" \ --data-urlencode "description=${description}" --data-urlencode "authz=${authz}" \ --data-urlencode "participantCount=${participantCount}" --data-urlencode "variableCount=${variableCount}" --data-urlencode "sampleCount=${sampleCount}" \ ${api}/consent fi done <consents.csv
